existing_features.title: Add a user-facing suggestions/feedback form in the frontend where visitors can submit feedback text (and optionally their name and contact info), and show clear success/error states in English.
Wire the frontend feedback form submission to the backend feedback API using React Query, and handle backend validation/errors gracefully.

new_feature_requests.summary: Add a suggestions/feedback form that sends submissions to a Discord channel (via webhook/integration)
Implement a backend Motoko API to accept feedback submissions, persist them (at least as an append-only log), and forward each submission to a specified Discord channel using a Discord webhook URL.
Add an admin-only mechanism to configure or update the Discord webhook URL used for forwarding feedback submissions.

projectName: Add suggestions/feedback form and send submissions to a Discord channel
